title: Turnover (Vegas Aces: The Quarterback Book 4)
features: I’m in love with a man who is marrying somebody else. At least that’s what was supposed to happen when I was kicked out of the wedding last night by the bride’s father.I find myself without a job, without a home, and without the pro football quarterback I’ve fallen for. The only thing left to do is head back to my parents’ place in Kansas as I give up every dream I’ve dared to have since I left it.I’m just not sure I’m ready for the turnover.
TURNOVER is the fourth book in the VEGAS ACES: THE QUARTERBACK series. This series must be read in order.
description: ★★★★★ "I'm in total awe of the complexity and depth of both the storyline and character development in Turnover. I cannot recommend this series enough." -Mommy's Book Escape★★★★★ "Lisa has thrown so many twists and turns at us in this book that your head is spinning. She always grabs your attention right from the start and this book is no different. You will be sitting on the edge of your seat throughout the story." -Kelchickbooklover★★★★★ "Lisa knows how to have her readers throwing their e-readers across the room." -J's Book Corner★★★★★ "Lisa has once again demonstrated her brilliance at being able to plan out a storyline which continually delivers suspense, intrigue and laughter." -Kirsty, Goodreads★★★★★ "5 edge-of-your-seat stars." -Michelle, Goodreads★★★★★ "I am so addicted! I cannot believe how much I am invested in Jake and Kate's relationship." -Susan, Goodreads★★★★★ "All I can say is, Jaw dropping!!!" -Lucy, Goodreads★★★★★ "Oh my goodness....this series and story just keeps getting better. The storyline grabs you, sucks you in and doesn't let go. A must, must, must read." -Lisa, Goodreads★★★★★ "Lisa Suzanne is a phenomenal author and knows how to keep you hooked and invested in her stories. The characters are so lovable and you are rooting for them to finally be able to work things out and to be together." -Nicola, Goodreads★★★★★ "Lisa Suzanne is the Queen of Romance with this football quarterback sports story of Jack and Kate." -Teresa, Goodreads★★★★★ "You may cry at Kate's heartbreak. You may laugh at more taco puns. You may get hot and bothered. And you may get angry. Very angry. So if you like a book that makes you feel, this is a good one." -Betsy, Goodreads★★★★★ "This whole series has been a page turner that kept me on the edge of my seat and had my heart soaring and breaking numerous times. I have fallen in love with this series!" -Doris, Goodreads
